statements: SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocation;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocation;
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocation WHERE project_id = 123;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, start_date FROM project_resource_allocation ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocation WHERE allocation_percentage > 80;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, start_date, end_date, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocation WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocation WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT project_id, COUNT(resource_id) as total_resources FROM project_resource_allocation GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_id, SUM(allocation_percentage) as total_allocation FROM project_resource_allocation GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_allocation > 50;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, ROUND(allocation_percentage * 100, 2) as allocation_percentage_percentage FROM project_resource_allocation ORDER BY allocation_percentage DESC, project_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocations ORDER BY allocation_percentage DESC;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE start_date <= '2022-06-30' OR end_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT SUM(allocation_percentage) AS total_allocation FROM project_resource_allocations;

SELECT project_id, resource_id, start_date, end_date, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC, allocation_percentage ASC
SELECT resource_id, project_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE allocation_percentage > 50 AND start_date <= '2023-01-01' ORDER BY allocation_percentage DESC

SELECT member_id, availability_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM team_member_availability WHERE availability_percentage < 70 AND end_date >= '2022-09-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC, availability_percentage DESC
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_percentage FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY project_id ASC, allocation_percentage DESC
SELECT member_id, availability_percentage, start_date, end_date FROM team_member_availability WHERE start_date >= '2022-08-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocations;
SELECT project_id, allocation_date FROM project_resource_allocations;
SELECT member_id, available_hours FROM team_member_availability;
SELECT project_id, member_id, workload_hours FROM workload_distribution ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE allocation_hours > 5;
SELECT * FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE allocation_hours > 40 ORDER BY allocation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT project_id, resource_id, allocation_hours FROM project_resource_allocations WHERE project_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND resource_id = 10 ORDER BY project_id ASC, allocation_date DESC;
SELECT distribution_id, project_id, member_id, distribution_date FROM workload_distribution WHERE workload_hours < 30 AND distribution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY distribution_date ASC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(allocation_hours) AS total_hours FROM project_resource_allocations GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_hours > 100 ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT member_id, available_date, available_hours FROM team_member_availability WHERE available_hours BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY available_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM project_resources;
SELECT resource_name, allocation_percent FROM project_resources;
SELECT project_id, member_id, start_date, end_date FROM workload_distribution WHERE project_id = 5;
SELECT member_name, role FROM team_members WHERE availability_status = TRUE;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM project_details
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT project_details.project_name, team_members.member_name FROM project_details JOIN workload_distribution ON project_details.project_id = workload_distribution.project_id JOIN team_members ON workload_distribution.member_id = team_members.member_id
SELECT resource_name, allocation_percent FROM project_resources WHERE allocation_percent > 0.5
SELECT project_id, COUNT(member_id) AS member_count FROM workload_distribution GROUP BY project_id
SELECT * FROM project;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name FROM project WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_member WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project WHERE project_id = 1;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_member WHERE member_id = 2;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, hours_allocated FROM project JOIN resource_allocation ON project.project_id = resource_allocation.project_id;
SELECT project_name, start_date, SUM(hours_required) AS total_hours_required FROM project JOIN workload ON project.project_id = workload.project_id GROUP BY project_name, start_date;
SELECT member_name, availability.date, available_hours FROM availability JOIN team_member ON availability.member_id = team_member.member_id WHERE team_member.member_id = 3;
